column4: hi, quick question:  my gf has 7.04 on her machine and wants to upgrade to 7.10 but upgrade manager doesn't show gutsy available because she had initially said to ignore the upgrade.  how do we get the upgrade to go?
edit /etc/apt/sources.list change all feisty to gutsy,  then do apt-get dist-upgrade
edit /etc/apt/sources.list change all feisty to gutsy,  then do apt-get update  and apt-get dist-upgrade I mean
